item.title: Running Nintendo Switch Games on iPhone at 60FPS – Free, No Jailbreak Needed
item.author: xuanphuc.a1gv@gmail.com (Felix Hoang)
item.description: If you thought the biggest gaming news was the upcoming Switch 2, think again. The emulation community has made a breakthrough: you can now run Nintendo Switch games on your iPhone or iPad at buttery-smooth 60FPS—all offline, with no jailbreak, no shady VPNs, and zero sketchiness.
